headline: Privacy by Design, Not by Promise
subheadline: Verifiable Security Built Into Every Layer
description: We don't ask you to trust us—our architecture makes it impossible for us to access your data. Here's exactly how we protect your privacy.

features.title: Zero-Knowledge Encryption
features.description: AES-256-GCM encryption happens in your browser before transmission. Keys never leave your device.

features.title: Enforced Auto-Deletion
features.description: Server-side cron jobs purge expired content every hour. Maximum lifetime: 24 hours, enforced.

features.title: No Tracking, Ever
features.description: No analytics scripts. No cookies. No fingerprinting. We don't know who you are or what you share.

features.title: Sub-2-Second Delivery
features.description: Global CDN with edge caching. Content delivered from the nearest server. Average latency: 180ms.

features.title: Ephemeral Storage Only
features.description: Encrypted blobs stored in memory-first databases. Nothing persists after expiration or access.

features.title: Open Source Auditability
features.description: Full source code available on GitHub. Security researchers can verify every claim we make.
